definition[0]: needing to be discussed or dealt with very soon
example[0]: Poverty is a more pressing problem than pollution.
definition[1]: a thing or group of things, especially records or CDs, that have been made by pressing plastic or metal into shape
example[1]: The CD, released in October, sold out a first pressing of 1,500 in just four months.
example[2]: The olives are heat treated during the second pressing.
